item1:
发货条件不是20或90的交货单自动分配库存出库
Automatically allocates inventory storage for delivery order that shipping condition is not 20 or 90
item2:
查看是否还有未自动执行的交货单
Check if there are any delivery orders that are not automatically executed
item4:
SAP下传相关Delivery Data
SAP download related delivery data
item5:
可执行Delivery数据
Executable Delivery Data
输出
item6:
拣配数据、更新Delivery数据状态
Picking data, updating Delivery data status
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的Delivery数据，系统将提示查无可用Delivery信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q050 Delivery Order Data Query作业查询Delivery数据与状态；或挑选指定的Delivery No.
If there is no eligible Delivery data, the system will prompt to check that no Delivery information is available. The user can run the Data Inquire-> Q050 Delivery Order Data Query job to query the Delivery data and status; or select the specified Delivery No.
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Delivery No后点选Query查询可拣配Delivery表头与明细清单
Enter the query conditions or select Delivery No and click Query to pick the Delivery header and detailed list.
2. 挑选要拣配的Delivery数据，点选Execute产生拣配数据并更新Delivery数据状态
Select the Delivery data, click Execute to generate picking data and update Delivery data status
3. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click the function menu Refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state.
4. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu Exit or close the window to end this operation
后置条件
item9:
自动仓库搬运出库
AS/RS move out the pallet
备注
item10:
此作业依据FEFO & FIFO等逻辑自动分配库存。此程序为备用，可检查是否有未能自动执行或未执行完成的交货单。
This operation automatically allocates inventory based on logic such as FEFO & FIFO. This program is a backup, you can check whether there is a delivery order that is not automatically executed or not executed completely.
